title: [Large-scale] TPACK-based Technology Integration Instructional Design Course for Pre-service Biology Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary biology knowledge and basic teaching experience
context.additional_context: Designed for in-service professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can perform technology-integrated lesson design for biology subjects by applying the TPACK framework
Learners can apply collaborative learning strategies using technological tools to biology education.
Learners can develop lesson plans that reflect the interaction between TPACK components (content knowledge, pedagogical knowledge, and technological knowledge).

resources: LMS Platform (Video Lectures, Discussion Forums, Assignment Submission System)
TPACK (Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge) Assessment Rubric
Digital Content Creation Tools (Canva, Google Workspace, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
